name: mikroe.click.xsensmti3
short_description: XSENS MTi-3 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a fully functional module that can be configured as an Inertial Measurement Unit, Vertical reference Unit, or even an Attitude & Heading Reference System. This board features the MTi-3, a module outputting 3D orientation, 3D rate of turn, 3D accelerations, and 3D magnetic field, depending on the product configuration from Xsens.
